postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Looking for part-time writers (work at home) 
 
We are a U.S. based company dedicated to providing our global clients with high quality proofreading/polishing/writing services. Working with us is like running your own business but without the hassles. You make your own schedule and work as little or as much as you want. You can earn $7 - $15 /page plus extra bonus, depends on duration, client's satisfaction and other specific requirements.  
Visit us at: www.usexpresswriting.com 
 
If you want to get paid for your love of writing, we will provide you with a friendly community of writers, competitive rewards and global clients. If you are a professional freelance writer, forget the days of endless searching for clients and enjoy, instead, a constant flow of orders and absolute freedom of choice. If you are a student, compare and see the difference between your part-time job and what we offer you: freedom to create your own schedule, great opportunities for growth and extremely competitive pay. 
 
Qualifications: 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Bachelor's degree or higher  
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Strong academic writing skills and related working experience preferred 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Proficient in Microsoft Office 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Know how to search journal articles online 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Be familiar with college essays, papers or personal statement 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Must be familiar with APA, MLA and Harvard format (citation, reference) 
 
We expect you to 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Produce quality original writing 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Meet client's requirements 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Deliver work on time 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Follow company guidelines 
 
We do not work with any agency, so please step down. If you cannot ensure accountability, reliability and originality of your work, please step down as well. 
 
If you are interested in this job offer, please fill out a simple application form at http://www.exp-write.com/#!job-application/c12em 
with CV and three recent academic articles 
 
Thank you
title: Looking for part-time writers (work at home)

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Job Responsibilities: 
•	Producing original, clear and credible ideas/messages/scripts/ tag lines/ ads and presenting these to internal and external stakeholders 
•	Writing clear, persuasive, original copy 
•	Monitoring campaign effectiveness and amending campaigns according to feedbacks  
•	Coming up with the content for the various forms of marketing collaterals, including publications, banners, presentations,  agreements, etc (non exhaustive) 
•	Proofreading of documents 
•	Any other ad hoc assignments as delegated from time to time 
 
Job Requirements: 
•	Min 1 year of content writing experience in the IT or F&B; sector. 
•	Excellent interpersonal and communication skills (Both verbal and written) 
•	Ability to work well under pressure and meet deadlines 
•	Self motivated and able to work well in a team 
•	Commercial awareness and savvy with the various types of social media platforms 
•	Meticulous with an emphasis on accuracy - both in terms of grammar and information 
•	Possess administrative and organizational skills 
•	Must be creative, adaptable, with the ability to produce innovative and original ideas
title: Advertising Content Writer

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
We are launching a new monthly publication and are looking to work with 20 short-story writers on a regular basis. Remuneration will be commensurate with the quality and quantity of output commissioned.  
 
Interested parties, please send in an original short story of no more than 1000 words on the theme "Canteen" to 
  show contact info 
 before 15 January 2017. You are free to interpret it in any way you like.  
 
No CVs or personal details are required as applicants will be assessed solely based on the originality of the story and quality of writing, regardless of gender, age or other qualifications. Multiple submissions are allowed. Shortlisted candidates will be contacted through the email they submitted their stories, by 21 January 2017, so please check your inbox. Thank you and we look forward to working with you!
title: Short story writers needed for regular publication

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Giovanni Pellone Design is a Tokyo-based product and graphic design studio, with an international clientele. Our projects involve a full range of communication design applications.  
For more information please visit www.giovannipellone.com  
 
We are seeking an experienced copywriter to work with our creative team in the production of online ads and website content, as well as packaging and brochures copy. 
 
The candidate should be creative, energetic, outspoken, responsible, reliable, and self-motivated.  He/she will be asked to manage his/her own schedule and meet tight project deadlines without fail. 
 
Minimum qualifications: 
• Native English speaker 
• Experience with writing headlines for ads and marketing campaigns 
• Experience writing consumer-product related content (food industry experience a plus) 
• Ability to adapt to a variety of writing styles and audiences  
• Residing within one hour time-zone difference from JST (Tokyo) 
• Strong writing portfolio and references (verifiable) 
 
 
Part-time: Freelance (daytime availability) 
Location: Off-site (Tokyo preferred) 
Hourly compensation based on skills and experience
title: Freelance Professional Copywriter
